name: Tunnel Ball Game
description:
⭐Challenge yourself with Tunnel Ball Game, the hardest twisty tiles, magic music game on mobile that your friends want to make some twists, but they can't. ⭐

⭐Show your skill and Let's Twist

How to play:
⭐Tap left – jump left. Tap right – jump right. EASY!

⭐Try Not to fall off the Tiles

⭐Collect gems

What is your best score?

Dunes, magic quest, ball twist, puzzle, slack, tunnel.
